Makrura

Medium monstrosity, unaligned

  • Armor Class 15 (natural armor)
  • Hit Points 26 (4d8 + 8)

  • Speed 30 ft., swim 30 ft.

STR DEX CON INT WIS CHA
13 (+1) 15 (+2) 14 (+2) 7 (-2) 10 (+0) 6 (-2)
  • Skills Stealth +4
  • Senses blindsight 30 ft., passive Perception 10
  • Languages Nerglish

  • Challenge 1 (200 XP)

Amphibious. The makrura can breathe air and water.

Actions

Multiattack. The makrura attacks twice with its claws.

Claw. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 11) The makrura has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.
